 2018-05732018-05-24
ActFinancial Administration Act
PrecisAppointment of DONALD PAUL BARNES of St. John's, Newfoundland and Labrador, to be President and Chief Executive Officer of Marine Atlantic Inc., to hold office during pleasure for a term of one year, or until such time as a new president and Chief Executive Officer is appointed, whichever occurs first.
